= Sections =
*[Installation installation]* - Gives instructions on how to install QuTiP and it's dependencies.

*[Guide Guide]* - Guide giving an overview of QuTiP data structures and functions

*[Examples Examples]* - A list of examples demonstrating the use of QuTiP in solving a variety of calculations.
